C

croche.maven.plugin.merge - package croche.maven.plugin.merge
 

E

execute() - Method in class croche.maven.plugin.merge.MergeMojo
 

G

getEncoding() - Method in class croche.maven.plugin.merge.Merge
This is an optional encoding to use when reading/writing the files being merged, if not specified then UTF-8 will be used
getIncludes() - Method in class croche.maven.plugin.merge.Merge
This is an optional set of file includes to look for, matching files name must contain one of these values, if not specified then all files found will be merged into the target file
getNameContainsOrderings() - Method in class croche.maven.plugin.merge.Merge
This is an optional set of strings that file names can contain that control the ordering of files merged into the final output file.
getSeparator() - Method in class croche.maven.plugin.merge.Merge
This is an optional separator output above merged files in the combined file.
getSourceDirs() - Method in class croche.maven.plugin.merge.Merge
The source directories where it will scan for files, it will look in these directories and all of their subdirectories
getTargetFile() - Method in class croche.maven.plugin.merge.Merge
The target file that the files in this merge will be merged into

M

Merge - Class in croche.maven.plugin.merge
The Merge represents a POJO to hold the merge configuration for a set of files
Merge() - Constructor for class croche.maven.plugin.merge.Merge
 
MergeMojo - Class in croche.maven.plugin.merge
Goal which merges text files from a series of directories into a single text output file
MergeMojo() - Constructor for class croche.maven.plugin.merge.MergeMojo
 

T

toString() - Method in class croche.maven.plugin.merge.Merge
